title: “Note:- Building material to be used in construction such as brick etc
clause_text: “Note:- Building material to be used in construction such as brick etc. shall contain fly ash. Fly ash shall also be used for construction and road/ maintenance as permissible as per I.S. specification” 31 The number of water closets, urinals, kitchens, and baths to be provided are as follows: Details of the source of water to be used in the construction. How much municipal land, if any, will be used for stacking building material?
